title: Multidisciplinary Technology Integration TPACK Competency Development Course for Pre-Service Teachers in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational pedagogical knowledge and elementary subject-matter expertise
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program for cultivating in-house corporate trainers, structured with 10-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments. Supports real-time interaction and collaborative learning via digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interaction of TPACK components (content knowledge, pedagogical knowledge, technological knowledge) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can create lesson plans applying a technology-integrated instructional design framework using modality-based social studies examples.
Learners can enhance the integration level of TPACK elements by three or more stages by reflecting formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
